name: TM300 Tube Amp Modeler
details:
Tube Amp ModelingThe TM300 features authentic modeling technology for 3 classic guitar amps, 3 gain modes and 3 mic placements for a total of 27 configurations that let you easily achieve the most sought-after tube amp sounds – from clean to crunch to super-fat distortion.
